label: Internal Quality Control Plan (QCP) required
quote: The contractor’s internal QCP must document how the contractor will meet and comply with the standards specified in this SOW and in accordance with U. S. Office of Personnel Management (OPM), Civil Service Retirement System (CSRS) and Federal Employee Retirement System (FERS) Handbook.

label: QCP must include procedures for quality, timeliness, responsiveness
quote: At a minimum, the QCP must include an outline of the procedures that the contractor will use to maintain quality, timeliness, responsiveness, and other requirements set forth in this solicitation.

label: Responsible for quality and timely completion of services
quote: The contractor will be responsible for the quality and timely completion of all contractor services.

label: Process cases within specified timeframes
quote: The contractor employee should process retirement, benefits and other relevant cases within the specified timeframe designated by the CBP Program Office... For retirement case processing, this would be within 30 calendar days prior to the effective date or 30 calendar days of receipt of a late retirement package. For benefits processing, this would be within 10 calendar days of the receipt of the benefits form. For all other duties outside of the direct scope of a retirement package or a benefits form, the expectation would be a 10-calendar day turnaround unless explicit instruction otherwise is given by assigning RABAS leadership.

label: Meet 85% standard for timely completion of assignments
quote: There will be an 85% standard requirement for timely completion of assignments.

label: Corrective action for more than three late assignments
quote: If there are more than three (3) unapproved or uninstructed late assignments, the contractor will take corrective action.

label: Remove employee if performance not satisfied after corrective action
quote: If the performance has not been satisfied within 90-days, the contractor employee will be removed from the contract.

label: Maintain 85% or higher accuracy rating
quote: The contractor employee will maintain an 85% or higher accuracy rating as will be determined by a quarter case quality review performed by RABAS leadership.

label: Meet 85% standard for accurate completion of assignments
quote: There will be an 85% standard requirement for accurate completion of assignments.

label: Corrective action if accuracy drops below 85%
quote: If in any quarterly case a quality review of the contractor employee’s percentage of accuracy drops below 85%, the contractor will take

label: Internal Quality Control Plan (QCP) required
quote: The contractor’s internal QCP must document how the contractor will meet and comply with the standards specified in this SOW and in accordance with U. S. Office of Personnel Management (OPM), Civil Service Retirement System (CSRS) and Federal Employee Retirement System (FERS) Handbook.
